channel.title: The Roy6's site!
channel.description:
I finally got around to making it. I hope the flame hasn't been extinguished yet. It's good for a couple laughs. Here's the link. I'll be adding a domain later tonight. It's pretty decent work, considering I was half asleep making it. The site template isn't mine, I customized it though. Just something really gay looking I found. I want to add an iframe to the topics on there. Or save the topics, and make them an archive on the site. I understand he didn't do enough stupid stuff to deserve such a site. But I was really bored.
[url=http://www.clansierra.info/theroy6/index.html]Link Here![/url]
I understand this doesn't have much to do with Graphics, but it would make more sense to post it here rather than Web Design or General Discussion, since the events occurred here.

item.title: The Roy6's site!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This has gone too far. ThAt0n36Uy remove at least the pictures from the site immediately or I will ban you from here, this type of childish behavior simply won’t be tolerated.

Read full topic

JUST REMOVE THE SITE IM SORRRYYy!!!

item.title: The Roy6's site!
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

The roy6:

Yea no one takes it fare enough to make a lien site about someone with a stolen picture

Wow… I only read the first sentence. Now I read the whole thing and clicked the video.
That is so wrong. ThAt. Just take that website off… Be mature. Even though you won’t
It’s not fair and it’s cruel. I think that The roy6 sees his mistake and he’ll never do whatever he did again to make you mad because he knows what the consequences will be. I think.

you probably think he deserves it, he probably does but.
It’s really cruel and mean to write about things like that.
And making up lies.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“The roy6, post:66, topic:190716”]It’s not the matter of laughing it’s the matter of posting my picture without my permission stealing it then making lies about me on “www” world wide web…

It is torture dude…[/quote]
Just stop being a little whiney bitch. Theres always gonna be assholes in the world. Not like anyone is gonna really care tbh.
Stop posting on here.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“The roy6, post:64, topic:190716”]Well keeping it up will send him straight to hell not my fault

you can ask for forgiveness then, but this kind of torture you won’t get it…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2008, 08:11:28 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Frell link=topic=254243.msg2122084#msg2122084 date=1205997048]

ok that is cruel, I’ll ddos it that is uncalled for thatoneguy, your just showing how immature you are by making a site and posting lies and someone else picture without their permission leave mitb there is enough immature little kids like you.

Agreed. The roy is very stupid and acts like he’s 8 but when your picture is on the web, his imagination only thinks of what could happen.
[/quote]

Hes talking about ThAt[/quote]
Its torture to you because your worrying about it. Just stop posting and they’ll stop laughing.

Read full topic

[quote=“The roy6, post:49, topic:190716”]COme backs there apologizes dude if you can’t tell the difference then thats why your such an ass[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2008, 07:57:32 PM[/size][hr]I don’t deserve anything i have told you sorry and that i will leave if you just delete that

anything being posted on the web is taking it far…[/quote]

What i mean is, stop saying your sorry and ‘attempting’ to insult them, there just laughing at the post. And cussing in every post doesnt do anything.

item.title: The Roy6's site!
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:48, topic:190716”]Yeh, I didn’t take it very far, that was like 3 minutes of downloading a template, editing it, and writing up a bio. Nothing really extreme. Extreme would be taking his face and taking a gay porn video, and putting his head on the guy taking it in the ass.

I already told you, I was bored. And you weren’t here when it happened. The guy was being very queer. And deserved it.[/quote]

yes I was… I am here just never really post. He did not deserve it to that extent though.

Read full topic
